item.title: Lack of litter bins, 29th October
item.description:
Please can litter bins be provided for Park Road and or Palace Road in order for people to dispose of their dog fouling waste bags and litter. At present there is only one bin in Freelands Road. As a consequence people are just littering the pavements or kerb side in the surrounding streets. If more bins were provided hopefully this would encourage people to tidy up their mess.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 19, Park Road, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large sycamore tree needs to be pruned and have a larger space in the asphalt, 29th October
item.description:
This tree has grown very high over the last year but the branches are thin and spindly and it looks very unhealthy. It has produced very little foliage this year. I'm afraid branches are going to break off. It's in a patch of asphalt next to Everyman Cinema with very little dirt to grow in, get water or nutrients.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 47, Church Road, Crystal Palace, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hazardous potholes covering a large area, 29th October
item.description:
Hazardous potholes have developed, over a large, wide area at the west of Pickett's Lock. This path is frequently used by many walkers, motors, cyclists and operatives and has got worse over the past few months. It also forms part of the route for the National Cycling Network, Route number 1. Please could this be looked at and repair be arranged. ///hired.ranged.recall

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Never-ending, deep, wide crack formed in the road, 29th October
item.description:
Ã€ never-ending, deep, wide crack has formed in the road. Parts of it are imposing a large hazard as the cracks are very wide and deep. The whole road will require inspection, as this fault stretches along the entire course of the road. Note: this road forms part of the national cycling network, in addition to the other purposes that it serves. Please arrange repair.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lee Park Way, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Burkes Warehouse pub fly tipping on their land causing street fly tipping, 29th October
item.description:
This was reported on 20 May and was apparently resolved but as you can see from this photo it was never resolved and in fact the problem has got worse as it is encouraging fly tipping on the street.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Boleyn Road, Hackney, London
